name: Octopress-snippets
body:
### Octopress Snippets

A number of YASnippets that make writing Octopress posts and pages easier when using Emacs.

### Installation

Install these snippets under the `markdown-mode` snippets directory in your YASnippets directory. You can add them directly, or in their own sub-folder. Either way they will show up in a separate group under Octopress

### What snippets do these install?

- Gist
- Inline codeblocks
- Backtick codeblocks
- Image
- Blockquotes
- Youtube (requires the [YouTube plugin](http://www.portwaypoint.co.uk/jekyll-youtube-liquid-template-tag-gist/))


### Authors and Contributors
Fork me, fix me and your name could be here!

### Support or Contact
Please use the GitHub Issues for this repository
tagline: A collection of YASnippets to use with markdown files for for the Octopress blogging system
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
